parameters.jsCode:
const dates = $input.all();
const startDate = dates.pop().json.date;
const endDate = dates[0].json.date;
const query = `SELECT 
    substr(cast(date as text),1,10) as date,
    "unitId",
    type,
    COUNT(id) as quantity,
    SUM(value) as value 
FROM (
    SELECT 
        c.id, 
        CASE 
            WHEN cpf = '00000000000' THEN 'NÃO IDENTIFICADO' 
            ELSE 'IDENTIFICADO' 
        END as type,
        "unitId",
        SUM(value) as value,
        DATE(c."date") as date
    FROM COUPONS c 
    INNER JOIN coupons_finishers cf ON cf."couponId" = c.id
    WHERE c."date" >= '${startDate} 00:00:00' 
      AND c."date" <= '${endDate} 23:59:59' 
    GROUP BY c.id, cpf, "unitId", DATE(c."date")
) as db1 
GROUP BY date, "unitId", type 
ORDER BY date, "unitId", type;
`;


return [{ json: { query } }];
